column2: ".... sorry I was spacing out and didn't notice you there."
"No, I'm not hurt, I was just lost in thought..."
"My friend found out that I've been slacking off and overall sucking at work..."
"But instead of getting angry, she just laughed and said, \"don't over do it\"."
"She did forgive me, but those words cut deep inside of me..."
"Since she can't become an ARKS, I thought I had to try my best in her place..."
"Somehow it's like she sees my short comings as her own fault..."
"... even though it's really all my own responsibility...."
